name: Snail's Pace (G.M. Pine, mia.mini.mia)
description:
The annual Snail's Pace Championships is here! Race, dodge obstacles and collect power-ups to see who will win. Will it be Gary, the underdog? Or Escargot the long-time champion?

Complete the track with a competitor to see who wins!

How to play:

Gary - WASD to move & U to jump 

Escargot - Arrow keys to move & space bar to jump

Come in contact with power-ups like the jump, speed and destroy obstacles power up to use them.
